A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: My biggest issue is the energy that was devoted to making the characters from previous movies look bad.  Rey was a love struck idiot trying to change a bad boy.  Luke spent years sulking over failure without doing anything to fix it.  Finn was a coward\, then was upgraded to useless baggage on a mission that didn't affect the outcome of the story.  Poe was a hotheaded dumbass.\n\nAdd in Luke dying at the end for no apparent reason\, taking a break from a space battle to go to a casino and talk about the evils of war profiteering\, and the overall derivative nature of the movie\, and you have a steaming pile of shit.
